text: Every day is a new beginning. Stay strong.
You are stronger than your urges.
Progress, not perfection.
The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
Small steps every day lead to big changes.
Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
Recovery is not a race. You don't have to feel guilty about taking time to heal.
It's okay to have setbacks. What matters is getting back up.
You've overcome challenges before. You can do it again.
Be patient with yourself. Growth takes time.
Every moment is a chance to turn it all around.
Your journey matters. Keep going.
Believe in the power of your own transformation.
Courage doesn't mean you're not afraid. It means you go on anyway.
You are worthy of the life you're trying to create.
One day at a time. One step at a time.
Your past doesn't define your future.
The best time to start was yesterday. The next best time is now.
You're not starting over, you're starting from experience.
Healing is not linear. Be kind to yourself.
